previous_positions: Founder Emeritus – A Thinking Ape (2016 – Present)
achievements: Founded **Manifold**, backed by a16z crypto and Initialized Capital, building NFT tools for top creators.
Co-created **RoyaltyRegistry.xyz**, an open-source NFT royalty platform with OpenSea, Coinbase, and SuperRare.
Co-founded **A Thinking Ape**, one of the earliest top-grossing mobile game studios on Apple and Google Play.
Led A Thinking Ape to its acquisition by **DECA Games for $105M**.
Early Y Combinator alum (2007), connected with lifelong co-founders.
Co-author of the **first US patent for real-time mobile chat systems**.

previous_education: University of Waterloo – Studied Mathematics & Fine Arts (dropped out for Y Combinator)

recent_achievements: Scaled Manifold into one of the leading NFT infrastructure startups.
Helped standardize NFT royalties across major marketplaces.
Oversaw A Thinking Ape’s acquisition for $105M.
common_interests: Angel investing in consumer tech and crypto
conversation_starters: Ask about the founding journey of Manifold and its collaboration with OpenSea and Coinbase.
Discuss the transition from gaming (A Thinking Ape) to Web3 infrastructure.
Explore his experience as one of the early YC 2007 founders.
Bring up his patent on real-time mobile chat systems.
notable_projects: A Thinking Ape – Top-grossing mobile gaming studio, acquired for $105M

credibility_indicators: Backed by top-tier VCs (a16z crypto, Initialized Capital)
Patent holder in mobile communication tech
potential_red_flags: Heavy focus on NFT/crypto sector, which can be volatile
No recent personal content posted publicly (lower direct visibility)
person_analysis.overview: Eric Diep is a Canadian entrepreneur and founder of Manifold, an NFT infrastructure startup backed by a16z crypto and Initialized Capital. Previously, he co-founded A Thinking Ape, one of the earliest top-grossing mobile gaming studios, which was acquired for $105M. A YC 2007 alum, Eric holds a US patent for real-time mobile chat systems and has become an active angel investor across consumer tech and crypto startups.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Eric Diep is a repeat founder and investor, best known for co-founding A Thinking Ape (acquired for $105M) and Manifold (a leading NFT infrastructure company). With a background in mathematics from the University of Waterloo and early experience at Y Combinator, he bridges consumer entertainment, crypto infrastructure, and startup angel investing.
key_insights: Has successfully built companies in both **gaming (A Thinking Ape)** and **Web3 infrastructure (Manifold)**.
One of the earliest YC founders from Canada (2007), building long-term co-founder relationships.
Holds a pioneering patent in real-time mobile chat, showing technical as well as entrepreneurial depth.
Strong VC backing and acquisition track record add credibility.
Public presence is strong through his ventures, though less so personally compared to more active founders.
